entry.title: Russia's Goal in Attack on Nuclear Plant: Take the Electricity, Ukraine Says
entry.content: The shelling is a deliberate step in Russia’s aim to steal Zaporizhzhia’s power by severing its connection to Ukraine’s remaining territory, according to Ukrainian leaders, international nuclear-power experts and the plant’s staff. Days of attacks have triggered Ukraine’s most perilous nuclear safety crisis since Chernobyl.

entry.title: Ukraine Accuses Russia of Using Nuclear Plant to Blackmail West
entry.content: President Volodymyr Zelensky urged tougher sanctions against Moscow after recent shelling in the vicinity of the Russian-occupied Zaporizhzhia facility prompted warnings of a nuclear accident.
